Comment: From the article: "One of the defining debates of Donald Trump‘s decade-long dominance of American politics is this: Is he playing at a level—in terms of strategy, rhetoric etc.—that most people simply can’t grasp? Or at a level more simple than anyone imagines? Put another way: Is he playing three-dimensional chess, or is he eating the red checkers?"  Is the author serious?!  Anyone with more than two brain cells has realized a long, long time ago that Trump has never been a genius playing three-dimensional chess.  He is, and has been since 2016, a mentally disturbed old man with dementia eating the red checkers.
